again."},{"lineNumber":104432,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まだ、まだよ　","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not yet, not yet,"},{"lineNumber":104433,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ終わっては……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's not over...\""},{"lineNumber":104434,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に満身創痍。疲労困憊。","translatedEnglishLine":"She was already battered and bruised, utterly exhausted."},{"lineNumber":104435,"originalJapaneseLine":"それでもレイラは立ち上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Still, Layla stood up."},{"lineNumber":104436,"originalJapaneseLine":"何度も打ち合った。","translatedEnglishLine":"They had battled many times."},{"lineNumber":104437,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのたびにレイラは立ち上がり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Each time, Layla got back up,"},{"lineNumber":104438,"originalJapaneseLine":"何度でも剣を握り直す。","translatedEnglishLine":"gripping her sword again and again."},{"lineNumber":104439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":104440,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックが剣を下ろす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick lowered his sword."},{"lineNumber":104441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう、やめましょう、レイラさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's stop now, Layla.\""},{"lineNumber":104442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No...!"},{"lineNumber":104443,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ私は戦えるのに……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can still fight...!\""},{"lineNumber":104444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、もう充分に分かりました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I’ve understood enough already...\""},{ "lineNumber":104445, "originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":104446,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは苦渋の決断であり、","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a painful decision,"},{"lineNumber":104447,"originalJapaneseLine":"鉛を飲むような思いだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"like swallowing lead."},{"lineNumber":104448,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、それでもリックは頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Still, Rick nodded."},{"lineNumber":104449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕の負けです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I concede defeat...\""},{ "lineNumber":104450, "originalJapaneseLine":"「え……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":104451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何があろうと絶対に諦めず、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No matter what, never give up,"},{"lineNumber":104452,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分の信念を貫く……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and uphold your own beliefs...\""},{"lineNumber":104453,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕は元々、あなたのそういうところを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s precisely the part of you"},{"lineNumber":104454,"originalJapaneseLine":"　好きになったのですから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"that I originally fell in love with...\""},{ "lineNumber":104455, "originalJapaneseLine":"「逆らえる筈もありませんでしたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I could never have resisted that...\""},{"lineNumber":104456,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":104457,"originalJapaneseLine":"（こういう時だけ……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Only at times like this..."},{"lineNumber":104458,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リックはこういう言葉、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick utters such words,"},{"lineNumber":104459,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サラッと言うのよね……ずるいわ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"so effortlessly... it's unfair...)"},{"lineNumber":104460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":104461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nothing...\""},{ "lineNumber":104462, "originalJapaneseLine":"「なら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then...\""},{"lineNumber":104463,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、戦い続けて下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, please continue fighting.\""},{"lineNumber":104464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……どうか死なないで下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... please don’t die.\""},{"lineNumber":104465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":104466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「絶対に」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Absolutely.\""},{"lineNumber":104467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、それはお互い様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But that goes both ways."},{"lineNumber":104468,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうか、リックも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please, Rick too...\""},{ "lineNumber":104469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、絶対に死なない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, I will absolutely not die."},{"lineNumber":104470,"originalJapaneseLine":"　約束します」","translatedEnglishLine":"I promise.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラもまた剣を抜いた。
訓練場ではレイラ一人だけが倒れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the training ground, only Layla was fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対するリックは息一つ乱していない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick, on the other hand, was not even out of breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ将軍の地位にいながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though they held the same rank of general,
the difference in their abilities was obvious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラはもう数え切れないほどに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Layla had been defeated by Rick countless times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックに打ちのめされていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She had been beaten down by Rick again and again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に満身創痍。疲労困憊。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was already battered and bruised, utterly exhausted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもレイラは立ち上がる。
そのたびにレイラは立ち上がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each time, Layla got back up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度でも剣を握り直す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gripping her sword again and again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、やめましょう、レイラさん」
「いえ、もう充分に分かりました……」
それは苦渋の決断であり、
鉛を飲むような思いだった。
だが、それでもリックは頷いた。
「何があろうと絶対に諦めず、
「僕は元々、あなたのそういうところを
好きになったのですから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that I originally fell in love with..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逆らえる筈もありませんでしたね……」
リックはこういう言葉、
サラッと言うのよね……ずるいわ……）
「でも……どうか死なないで下さい」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラもまた剣を抜いた。
訓練場ではレイラ一人だけが倒れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the training ground, only Layla was fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対するリックは息一つ乱していない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick, on the other hand, was not even out of breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ将軍の地位にいながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though they held the same rank of general,
the difference in their abilities was obvious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラはもう数え切れないほどに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Layla had been defeated by Rick countless times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックに打ちのめされていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She had been beaten down by Rick again and again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に満身創痍。疲労困憊。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was already battered and bruised, utterly exhausted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもレイラは立ち上がる。
そのたびにレイラは立ち上がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each time, Layla got back up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度でも剣を握り直す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gripping her sword again and again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、やめましょう、レイラさん」
「いえ、もう充分に分かりました……」
それは苦渋の決断であり、

だが、それでもリックは頷いた。
「何があろうと絶対に諦めず、
「僕は元々、あなたのそういうところを
好きになったのですから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that I originally fell in love with..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逆らえる筈もありませんでしたね……」
リックはこういう言葉、
サラッと言うのよね……ずるいわ……）
「でも……どうか死なないで下さい」
